summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Court Street, from Rainier Avenue to a point 430 feet west thereof; by constructing sewers and side sewers together with the necessary appurtenances and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7925 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
